Well,I am a dancer so automatically I liked this film. The only thing I didn't like was they didn't have much dancing as I thought there would be, replacing more dialogue. I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. Some people may criticise that people in the movie behaved like animals because all of them couldn't keep their hands off each other and slept with anyone around. But I thought it was so different from the usual conventional cinema, that's what made "Les Valseuses" so unique and funny too.
